---

Excellent! I now have a comprehensive understanding of the codebase. Let me provide you with a detailed analysis:

## **Rallly - Existing Features Summary**

### Core Functionality
**Poll/Meeting Scheduling Platform** - An open-source alternative to Doodle for finding the best time for meetings and events.

### Key Features Currently Implemented:

#### 1. **Poll Management**
- Create, edit, duplicate, and delete polls
- Month and week calendar views for date/time selection
- Mixed date and time options
- Poll status management (Live, Paused, Finalized)
- CSV export functionality
- Poll settings (require email, hide participants, hide scores)
- Auto timezone conversion for participants
- Extended poll lifetime

#### 2. **Participant Experience**
- Vote with Yes/No/"If need be" options
- Edit and submit votes
- Comment system (can be disabled)
- Anonymous guest voting
- Email notifications for poll updates
- Unsubscribe from notifications
- Participant list visibility

#### 3. **Authentication & User Management**
- Email-based auth with verification codes
- SSO support (OAuth providers)
- Guest polls (claimable by creating account)
- Profile management with avatars
- Password setup/change functionality
- Account deletion

#### 4. **Spaces/Workspaces**
- Multi-tenant workspace support
- Member invitation system
- Role-based access (Owner, Admin, Member)
- Space settings and billing
- Seat management for paid plans

#### 5. **Events Dashboard**
- Finalized events tracking
- Upcoming/Past/Canceled/Unconfirmed event views
- Add to calendar integration (iCal, Google, Microsoft 365, Yahoo, Outlook)
- Event search and filtering

#### 6. **Billing & Monetization**
- Stripe integration
- Free and Pro tiers
- Subscription management
- License key system for self-hosted

#### 7. **Administration**
- Control panel for admins
- User management (view, delete, change roles)
- License management
- Instance settings
- User registration toggle
- Rate limiting

#### 8. **Internationalization**
- 25+ languages supported (Spanish, German, French, Japanese, Korean, etc.)
- Localized date/time formats
- Translation contribution workflow via Crowdin

#### 9. **Technical Features**
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- Prisma ORM + PostgreSQL
- tRPC for API
- Email system
- S3 storage integration
- PostHog analytics
- Sentry error tracking
- Docker deployment
- Self-hosting support

---

## **Feature Ideas for Improvement**

### üéØ **High-Impact Features**

1. **AI-Powered Scheduling Assistant**
   - Analyze participant availability patterns and suggest optimal meeting times
   - Auto-generate meeting descriptions based on title
   - Smart time zone suggestions based on participant locations
   - Predict best meeting duration based on title/context

2. **Calendar Integration (Read)**
   - Connect to Google Calendar, Outlook, Apple Calendar
   - Auto-mark unavailable times based on existing calendar events
   - Show "busy/free" status without revealing event details
   - Sync finalized polls directly to connected calendars

3. **Recurring Polls & Templates**
   - Save poll as template for reuse
   - Create recurring polls (weekly team sync, monthly meetup)
   - Quick-create from frequently used templates
   - Poll template marketplace/sharing

4. **Advanced Voting Options**
   - Ranked choice voting (1st, 2nd, 3rd preference)
   - Weighted votes for different participants
   - Conditional votes ("only if Person X can make it")
   - Tentative vs. confirmed availability

5. **Mobile Apps**
   - Native iOS and Android apps
   - Push notifications for poll updates
   - Offline voting (sync when online)
   - Mobile-first responsive improvements

### üí° **Engagement & Collaboration Features**

6. **Real-Time Collaboration**
   - Live cursor/presence indicators
   - See who's currently viewing the poll
   - Real-time vote updates (WebSocket)
   - Live chat or threaded discussions

7. **Participant Suggestions**
   - AI-powered "best time" recommendation with reasoning
   - Visual heatmap showing optimal times
   - Automatic consensus detection
   - Smart notifications when consensus is reached

8. **Reminder System**
   - Auto-remind participants who haven't voted
   - Customizable reminder cadence
   - Deadline countdown for participants
   - "Last chance to vote" notifications

9. **Poll Analytics & Insights**
   - Response rate tracking
   - Time-to-response metrics
   - Participation patterns by user
   - Export analytics reports

### üîß **User Experience Enhancements**

10. **Improved Onboarding**
    - Interactive tutorial for first-time users
    - Poll creation wizard with step-by-step guidance
    - Sample polls to explore features
    - Tooltips and contextual help

11. **Drag-and-Drop Calendar Interface**
    - Drag availability blocks instead of clicking
    - Multi-select with shift/ctrl keys
    - Copy availability across weeks
    - Visual range selection

12. **Custom Branding (Pro Feature)**
    - Custom domain support
    - White-label option
    - Custom logos and colors
    - Remove "Powered by Rallly" footer

13. **Poll Embedding**
    - Embeddable widget for websites
    - iFrame embed code generation
    - WordPress/Notion/Slack integrations
    - API for third-party integrations

### üìä **Business & Team Features**

14. **Team Scheduling Intelligence**
    - Find common availability across multiple calendars
    - Team working hours preferences
    - Meeting cadence analysis
    - Automatic meeting buffer time

15. **Integration Ecosystem**
    - Slack bot for poll creation and voting
    - Microsoft Teams integration
    - Zoom/Meet integration (auto-add video links)
    - GitHub/Linear integration for team planning

16. **Booking Pages**
    - Personal scheduling page (like Calendly)
    - One-on-one meeting booking
    - Group availability finder
    - Automatic poll creation from booking requests

17. **Meeting Room/Resource Booking**
    - Add meeting room constraints
    - Resource availability checking
    - Equipment/resource reservation alongside polls
    - Location-based suggestions

### üé® **Customization & Flexibility**

18. **Advanced Poll Types**
    - Location polls (vote on venue)
    - Multi-question polls
    - Budget/cost voting
    - Activity/agenda item selection

19. **Conditional Logic**
    - Show/hide options based on votes
    - Minimum/maximum participant requirements
    - Auto-close poll when threshold is met
    - Approval workflows for finalization

20. **Custom Fields**
    - Add custom questions to participant form
    - Dietary restrictions, special needs
    - RSVP additional info
    - Custom metadata per poll

### üîê **Security & Privacy**

21. **Enhanced Privacy Controls**
    - Anonymous voting mode
    - Password-protected polls
    - View-only links (can't vote)
    - Voter verification via email/phone

22. **Audit Logs**
    - Track all poll changes
    - Vote history and modifications
    - Export audit trail
    - Compliance reporting

### üöÄ **Performance & Scale**

23. **Offline Mode**
    - PWA with offline capabilities
    - Queue actions when offline
    - Sync when connection returns

24. **Performance Optimizations**
    - Lazy loading for large participant lists
    - Virtual scrolling for polls with many options
    - Improved caching strategy
    - Edge function optimization

---

## **Quick Wins (Easy to Implement)**

- **Keyboard shortcuts** for power users
- **Dark mode improvements** (ensure all UI elements respect dark mode)
- **Bulk actions** (delete multiple polls, export multiple events)
- **Quick filters** on dashboard (show only my polls, show polls expiring soon)
- **Participant avatars** auto-generation (if no image uploaded)
- **Copy poll settings** when duplicating
- **Time slot presets** (business hours, mornings only, etc.)
- **QR code generation** for poll sharing
